product.title: Spectrum Cotton White - Venetian Blind
product.description: Spectrum's cotton white comprises of off-white, gloss finish slats and matching fittings, including the pull-cords and rails. This is a colour for those who want the purity of white without the dazzling brightness of it. Incorporate into an off-white, modern country kitchen to add a hint of contemporary utilitarianism to the mix. Accent with soft silvers and dove greys for a cool, fresh style, or with brushed golds and cappuccino beiges for a warm and welcoming colour theme that will make your guests never want to leave.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Frost White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Oslo is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The oslo blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Lilywhite Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home. The pure white colouring is simply perfect for blending in effortlessly with more neutral decors as well as add when pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Space Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Lima - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Casablanca - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Solitaire - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Christine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gossip - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Peach White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A pretty, delicate shade of cream, the spectrum in peach white has a subtle hint of, you guessed it, peach hue. The dainty colour of this blind does little to betray the strength and durability of the materials used, with its heavy gauge aluminium slats that will never sag. The peach white will harmonise beautifully with true colour peaches and apricots, to create a wonderfully sophisticated and unusual colour scheme in a living room or bedroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gloss White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The shiny gloss finish of the spectrum's gloss white shows off the quality of its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and comes with matching rails as well as pull-cords, which allow you to control the light coming into the room with ease. For a sheen to match the finish of a high quality suite, use in the bathroom amongst white floor and wall tiling. Then use a bold accent colour, such as cerise or orange, to add a pop of colour, which you can change at will.

relproducts.title: Spectrum White China - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A soft, off-white, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum in white china is pretty and discreet in appearance, yet strong and durable in functionality, due to its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and high quality fittings in the form of matching pull-cords and rails. Integrate the white china into a calming pastel colour palette in your home office, where you can combine a cool aesthetic with workable practicality.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.
